import sys

n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
h = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

ans = 0

for i in range(n):
    if h[i] > k:
        ans += h[i] - k
        h[i] = k

print(ans)

import sys

n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
h = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    if h[i] > k:
        ans += h[i] - k
        h[i] = k

print(ans)

def tower_slices(n, k, h):
    """
    :type n: int
    :type k: int
    :type h: List[int]
    :rtype: int
    """
    h = sorted(h, reverse=True)
    res = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if h[i] > k:
            res += h[i] - k
            h[i] = k
    return res
